document.masterDocTitle: Revision of Eccoptolonthus Bernhauer (Coleoptera: Staphylininae: Philonthina) with descriptions of four new species from China

subSubSection.paragraph:
Sharp, 1874: 47 (
Philonthus
, type locality: Nagasaki, eastern Siberia, Lake Baikal; China ); Matsumura, 1911: 114 (
Philonthus
, Japan ); Bernhauer & Schubert, 1914: 354 (
Philonthus
, catalog); Scheerpeltz, 1933: 1359 (
Philonthus
, catalog); Adachi, 1937: 56 (
Philonthus , Izu-Oshima
); Nakane, 1963: 91 (
Philonthus
, habitus image, Japan ); Watanabe & Shibata, 1972: 64 (
Philonthus
, Yaku-shima Island);
Yuh et al ., 1985: 242
(
Philonthus
, Korea ); Herman, 2001a: 2949 (
Philonthus
, catalog); Smetana, 2004: 649 (
Philonthus
, catalog of Palaearctic region); Hayashi, 2008: 149 (
Pseudohesperus
); Hromádka, 2010: 497 (
Pseudohesperus
); Li & Zhou, 2011: 708–710 (
Pseudohesperus
, first record from China ); Newton, 2015: 14 (transferred to
Eccoptolonthus
, catalog); Schülke & Smetana, 2015: 1021 (
Eccoptolonthus
, catalog); Li, 2019: 425 (
Eccoptolonthus ,
catalog).

Syn.:
Philonthus insignitus Fauvel, 1875
: XXIX ( type locality: Russia , Baikal); Schillhammer, 2015: 23 (synonym of
E. rutiliventris
).

Materials examined.
China : Beijing :
3 ♂♂ , 25 ♀♀ , Xiaolongmen ( 39°58’N , 115°28’E ),
1140–1270 m
,
14. VI
.– 2.VII.2000, Yu Xiaodong collected ( IZ-CAS )
;
1 ♂ , 1 ♀ , Xiaolongmen ( 39°58’N , 115°28’E ),
19. VI
.1999, Yu Xiaodong collected ( IZ-CAS )
;
3 ♀♀ , Xiaolongmen ( 39°58’N , 115°28’E ),
25. VI
.2006, Chen Yongjie collected (
IZ-CAS
)
;
1 ♀ , Xiaolongmen ( 39°58’N , 115°28’E ),
20.VII.1999
, Zhou Hongzhang collected ( IZ-CAS )
;
Shaanxi :
2 ♀♀ , Taibaishan ( 33°57’N , 107°45’E ),
1800 m
,
8. VI
.2007, Zhou Hongzhang collected ( IZ-CAS )
;
Jilin :
1 ♂ , 1 ♀ , Changbaishan ( 41°34’N , 126°27’E ),
900–1800 m
,
11.VII.1987
( IZ-CAS )
;
Ningxia :
3 ♂♂ , 7 ♀♀ , Liupanshan ( 35°39’N , 106°17’E ),
1990–2100 m
,
27–28. VI
.2008, Zhou Haisheng & Zhao Zongyi collected ( IZ-CAS )
.

Distribution. China ( Beijing , Jilin , Liaoning , Ningxia , Shaanxi ), Japan ( Hokkaido , Honshu, Kyushu, Shikoku), Kazakhstan , Korea (S), Mongolia , Nepal , Russia (European, Siberia, Far East, Sakhalin , Kuriles), Ryukyu Is (Yakushima).
